review.reviewtitle: i love me some off-brand Yahtzee
review.reviewbody: mario creeps me out but i can ignore it because its funny
I like this a lot, but how do you jump mario in checkers????
mario beated me in checkers im mad but i beat him in go fish so i give 5 sytars

review.reviewtitle: Great game, anyone who loses to Mario has a skill issue
review.reviewbody: This game made my childhood, and I remember playing it on one of the School Computers all the time. I was a really smart kid too, so after about 10 games against Mario in most games (not go fish, that depends on RNG) I started to win almost every time. And yes, I was only able to play it a bunch because I had special privileges due to being Special Ed. for my Autism and ADHD, along with a few other things. Our school was (and still IS to this day) very supportive of Special Ed. students due to the high abundance of them. 10/10 rating from me for special childhood memories.
thanks to this game i can now say that i beat Super Mario at yahtzee kinda

review.reviewtitle: How is this a bad mario game
review.reviewbody: Everyone probably shat on this masterpiece for being labeled as "educational". Whoever tagged it as such, you had one job.
I like this game but it cheats for Mario to win. I was playing Yacht and Mario rolled a Yahtzee of all 6's on the FIRST ROLL. Absolute BS!!

review.reviewtitle: Mario's gonna put theese on the FULL HOUSE line.
review.reviewbody:
It's fun gambling with Mario, espicaly when he gets a full house on the second move
Oh and also i got a yacht on the first move, on the first roll once.
Very fun.
I PLWAS PLAYING IT WITH SOMEONE AND THE DOMINOES WAS INNCORECT MARIO THREW THE GAME ACTIVELY. THE GAME THEN CRASHED AND HE WOULDNT STOP TALKING!!!!!

review.reviewtitle: So happy to see this available online!
review.reviewbody: I played this game A LOT when I was a tot. I'm so happy to be able to pull it up and play checkers or dominos for a quick break. Makes me happy to hear Mario say he's enjoying playing with me; I'd forgotten the game did that.
I don't like the cursor's movement. it is sometimes chopped.
